search.description:
Allows you to find products by passing in either a search term or product Id.
Initial Search Value Required

userId.description: A unique identified to authorize a user. This is required for all requests.

filter.term.description: A search term to filter product results. As an example, you could input milk, bread, or salt. Search terms are limited to a maximum of 8 words. Each new space in the search term denotes a new word.

filter.locationId.description: The locationId of the store. When using this filter, only products available at that location are returned. Optional.

filter.productId.description: The productId of the products(s) to return. For more than one item, the list must be comma-separated. When used, all other query parameters are ignored. Optional.

filter.brand.description: The brand name of the products to return. When using this filter, only products by that brand are returned. Brand names are case-sensitive, and lists must be pipe-separated. Optional.

filter.fulfillment.description:
The available fulfillment types of the product(s) to return. Fulfillment types are case-sensitive, and lists must be comma-separated. Must be one or more of the follow types:

- ais: Available In Store 
- csp: Curbside Pickup
- dth: Delivery to Home
- sth: Ship to Home

Optional.

add.description: Provides access to add items to an authenticated customer's cart.

userId.description: A unique identified to authorize a user. This is required for all requests.

items.description: An array of items in the cart.
